FuncDef: This command allows or blocks RSVP-TE LSP to be used as a transport LSP for BGP tunnel routes.

ParaDef.Info: Allows RSVP-TE LSP to be used as transport LSP from the ASBR to local PE router, from ingress PE to ASBR in the local AS or between multi-hop eBGP peers with ASBR to ASBR adjacency.
Blocks RSVP-TE LSP to be used as transport LSP from the ASBR to local PE router, from ingress PE to ASBR in the local AS or between multi-hop eBGP peers with ASBR to ASBR adjacency.
